column4: i just installed ubuntu on my desktop pc, all went well but i cannot login (checked the keyboard settings and the password as login to see if its ok)
login apears normally and i typed my password into the login box to check it
i didn't. it seems a problem with locales and keyboard at install time. when i made italian install i had the prob, when i made english i didn't
i think that happens something like this:
did you manage to change your keyboardsettings afterwards?
you can do it after install
but i hade same prob using regular letters ( not capital )
i think that when you type pass the keyboard is still set to english the you reboot you got a dutch keyboard with "english pass", but this is only my opinion, i could be wrong
i'm affraid i need a little more info here :-)
